# Cost function for cross validation
cost <- function(obs, pred) {
  outcome <- pred > 0.5
  return(1 - (sum(obs == outcome) / length(obs)))
}

library(readr)

  file = "train.csv",
  col_types = cols(
    Pclass = col_character(),
    SibSp = col_character(),
    Parch = col_character()

)

train_df <- train_df %>%
  mutate(did_survive = as.logical(Survived))
